roleset.name: to encase in a capsule

example.name: transitive
example.text: Under the plan , the companies will use Calgene 's patented technology to encapsulate microbes such as Bacillus subtilis , a bacterium , to enhance their biological activity against plant diseases .

propbank.arg: microbes such as Bacillus subtilis , a bacterium
to enhance their biological activity against plant diseases

roleset.note: ENCAPSULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encapsulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from encapsulate.01-v predicate notes)
